title: New Feature Launch Playbook
shortDescription: Complete workflow from discovery to execution for launching new features.
description: This collection guides you through the entire process of launching a new feature, from initial discovery and prioritization through creating documentation, building prototypes, and managing the release. Follow these prompts in order for a comprehensive feature launch process.

prompts.note: Start by evaluating and prioritizing your feature ideas
Define who you're building this feature for
Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document
Identify and plan for potential risks

prerequisites: A feature idea or problem to solve
Basic understanding of your target users
